DOC.brief_summary: A total 20 subject present urinary stone ( ) kidney ureter treat extracorporeal shockwave lithotripsy device fragment stone . Subjects follow 14 day . If 14 day follow-up visit subject continue present stone size 4 mm great option retreatment intervention . If subject consent retreat time , subject follow another 14 day .
DOC.brief_title: Extracorporeal Shock Wave Lithotriptor Indicated Fragmenting Urinary Stones Kidney
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis solitary Urinary stone renal pelvis renal calyx ureter Presence one stone great 4 mm less 12 mm Urinary tract obstruction , acute unresolved cholecystitis , cholangitis , pancreatitis obstruction biliary duct system Impaction stone treat Staghorn stone Failed inadequate lithotripsy procedure within 3 month prior study Coagulation abnormality anticoagulation therapy Pregnant females childbearing potential General , spinal epidural anesthesia contraindicate Can position correctly fluoroscopic imaging
